reviews.review: The thing which makes this Counter-Strike different than the other ones is that this one has story mode. I always enjoyed games with story modes, story lines etc. CS: CZ Deleted Scenes is definitely for me and everyone who likes these type of games.

It's cool if you like playing old games !

Never thought an actual fun Counter Strike game could ever exist; a decent gallery of missions that's better than Overwatch 2, the guns actually work and most things felt optimised, despite it's age. And yet all we got is CSGO trying to mimic Fortshite, this was indeed a suprise.

For reasons beyond me, all of this content was cut and dropped despite having a ton of potential of making Counter Strike an approachable game, the campaign may have felt repetitive at times, but I liked how it tried to do a lot of things and do them well.  

It's a shame to see all of this content go to waste. To some Counter Strike purists, this time capsule of a game may have came across as your generic Call of Duty first person shooter, but honestly I think it's the only Counter Strike game it had fun to be found in.

7/10

[h1]Counter-Strike: Condition Zero Deleted Scenes[/h1]

[u]Pontos Positivos[/u]

+ Variedade de armas decente.
+ Ambientes bons, com uma boa variedade.
+ Dura√ß√£o decente (em torno de 6 horas na dificuldade "Hard").

[u]Pontos Negativos[/u]

- Gameplay gen√©rica e entediante.
- Trilha sonora gen√©rica.
- Intelig√™ncia artificial ruim.
- Bugs frequentes. Em um ponto eu precisei usar noclip para prosseguir.

[h1]Resumo[/h1]

[i]Counter-Strike: Condition Zero Deleted Scenes[/i] parecia interessante no come√ßo, afinal [i]Counter Strike[/i] √© sempre reconhecido por seu status lend√°rio no g√™nero multiplayer, e uma campanha feita com base nele podia ser uma boa ideia. Infelizmente [i]Deleted Scenes[/i] √© extremamente gen√©rico e n√£o oferece quase nada de interessante. A gameplay √© levemente diferente do [i]Counter Strike[/i], tanto do [i]1.6[/i] quanto do [i]Condition Zero[/i]. Notavelmente, as armas s√£o muito menos imprecisas para acomodar um estilo de jogo mais r√°pido. A intelig√™ncia artificial certamente ajuda a gameplay a ser mais r√°pida, porque ela √© simplesmente inacabada. O comportamento dos inimigos se baseia em atirar, ou correr na sua dire√ß√£o, parar e atirar. Certos inimigos possuem machetes, snipers e alguns at√© possuem coletes-bomba. Isso n√£o ajuda a mediocridade no geral, suplementado pela trilha sonora gen√©rica. As √∫nicas coisas interessantes que [i]Deleted Scenes[/i] oferece √© o fato de que as miss√µes possuem ambientes variados e bem feitos nos padr√µes da [i]GoldSrc[/i] e que as scripted sequences s√£o bem incomuns para a √©poca, precedendo o uso frequente delas nos anos seguintes. No geral, [i]Deleted Scenes[/i] foi uma boa ideia com uma m√° execu√ß√£o. Mesmo que resp√≠cios do potencial do jogo sejam vis√≠veis, n√£o h√° motivos para jog√°-lo.

[b]Diga se a review foi √∫til ou n√£o, e se n√£o foi, comente por que. Eu Agrade√ßo.[/b]

Deleted Scenes from Counter-Strike : Condition Zero

A pretty enjoyable story campaign playing the role of the counter terrorists.

Pros:
*Enjoyable but brief music
*Nice looking environments
*Causing Destruction and pacing went well together.
*Fun dialogue
*The stealth action parts were good

Cons:
*Easy to get lost at some points, but nothing major
*Hidden enemies that don't have any telegraph of being there (Moving around, making sound, etc)
*Ammo was somewhat scarce for a game with alot of enemies at some points. Bit easy to run out even with placing shots well.

Light side of this game is story mode which is fun to play!
Great variety and nice self contained stories. Can be punishing with bosses however so be prepared for some difficult fights. World map doesnt look right in widescreen but still works.
